title: YelpCamp
description: Developed a feature-rich web application inspired by Yelp and Google Reviews to share, discover, review, and rate campgrounds. Course credit: The Web Developer Bootcamp by Colt Steele

title: Project Alpha
description: Developed as a course project to enhance proficiency in Unreal Engine 5 and C++ programming. Course Credit: Unreal Engine 5 C++ The Ultimate Game Developer Course by Stephen Ulibarri

title: Intelligent Robot
description: A robot that scans traffic signs and moves accordingly. Embedded Systems (EECS 2032) course project
